definition[0]: the short part of something long and thin, such as a cigarette or pencil, that is left when the rest has been used
definition[1]: the part of a ticket that is given back to you after it has been torn, as proof that you have paid
definition[2]: a piece of a cheque left in a cheque book as a record after the main part has been torn out
definition[3]: the part of something such as a cheque that you complete and keep as a record
example[3]: I went through my check stubs and other records to try to find where the money had gone.
